issue.title: [Rust] Automatically Regenerate IPC messages from Flatbuffers
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7248](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7248). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It would be great if there was an automatic way to regenerate the code for the Flatbuffer input files. This makes following the mainline development easier.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7248?focusedCommentId=16981169) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5888
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5888>
